messages.message:
Hi @Jag
Is this a recent account you created or created long ago ? Sample project would be created automatically when documents are uploaded.
I tried uploading these docs to a new project in aihub prod - the second response no more mixes up with different documents now. So this looks like needs to reindex based on intermediate changes that happened in the model.

@Balaram â€” when are we planning to bring the empty state UX of a standard conversation for the sample conversation? Multiple users have found the pre populated QnA confusing. Can we ensure it makes it to the 23.41 release at least?

@Varun Jain To confirm the expected behaviour, for the first time logged in user we should show only the sample projects with the documents. The prompts section should be empty.

I assume loginless will also follow the same behaviour.
Also the issue reported in this thread will get resolved once the reindexing feature is added.
The chat log should show the same information as for a new conversation now (prompt suggestions, best practices). The experience would be same across loginless and logged in users.
This change will make the UX uniform across the sample conversation and user conversations, across loginless and logged in states.
Let me know if you have any questions, @Balaram
@Rakesh I didn't log in. Top right of aihub was still saying "Sign in" when I clicked Converse.
ok thanks for confirming @Jag - so this is with default loginless mode then ?
